title: $:/litClock/times/-18:25-Stan Barstow
quote_last: I go into the bathroom and have a wash, then while the Old Lady’s busy in the kitchen helping Chris with the washing up I get my coat and nip out down the stairs.

title: $:/litClock/times/-18:25-Bram Stoker
quote_first: I have this moment, while writing, had a wire from Jonathan saying that he leaves by the
quote_last: tonight from Launceston and will be here at 10.18, so that I shall have no fear tonight.
